<<<<<<< HEAD
A remonstrance against the non-residents of Great Brittaine, or, Non-residency condemned by Scripture, by strength of arguments, by fathers, councels, canon-law, by the iudgement of reverend and learned divines Blaxton, John.
[15], 47 p.
Printed by T. Badger for Rich. Royston ..., London : 1642.
Illustrated t.p. with caption: The carelesse non-resident. Errata: p. [15]. Reproduction of original in Yale University Library and Thomason Collection, British Library.
=======
